column1: Look at what you've done to my boy! You told Horace that he was responsible for his weight! You made him believe that with exercise and proper diet, he could be thin! When we told you it was his genetics!
Look at these kids! They're not getting any thinner!  Your camp is a fraud! You need to accept the fact that most fat people are just genetically fat!
And I'm going to call all the other parents to tell them to come claim their kids as well! Your camp is a WASTE ...of time!
Well, what the heck. Maybe when you're all done you can teach me a thing or two, huh son?
